title: Textbook publishing revenue in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.

Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, gradually increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 11.7 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 8.16 was reported at Year 2012
